Skills: Potentials ( Computer / Software / Electronics / MIS Education Graduates)- Emiratization Nationals
Fresh graduates or experience in 1-2/- years in any technology.

Knowledge in MS Office.

Information Monitoring.
Can work 8AM - 5 PM /Saturday and Sunday off.

Working location is Dubai/ Abu Dhabi offices.
Remote or work from home facilities are not available.
Bilingual ( English/ Arabic).
